events.message: I have just filed a claim for my car accident that occurred yesterday on Elm Street.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident as it involves a vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to my case and they introduced themselves promptly.
Received official acknowledgement from the insurer confirming receipt of my claim.
The insurer requested police reports and photos of the damaged vehicle for further investigation.
All requested documents, including the police report and car photos, were submitted via the online portal.
The claims team has started the investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was caused by a third party.
An initial settlement offer was proposed covering the estimated repair costs of my vehicle.
I provided positive feedback on the clear communication and prompt settlement offer.
My claim has been officially approved after agreeing on the settlement amount.
Payment for the repair costs has been issued to my bank account successfully.
The claim has been closed after full payment and repair confirmation from my side.
All claim documentation has been archived for future reference and record-keeping.
